long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DilterBilter, a History Conversation Filter, swiftly filters your ChatGPT conversations

Designed to enhance your browsing and chat experience, DilterBilter simplifies your interaction with the platform by providing a dynamic search field for real-time filtering of chats.

Current limitation: it filters the names of the conversations only. Please support the development of these new features at buymeacoffee.com/yatsiv:

* Filter all the conversations available in your ChatGPT
* Search messages by keywords

You can also fork the plugin on github and suggest improvements

üåê To utilize DilterBilter, the ChatGPT History Filter, simply click on the extension icon located on your browser's toolbar. This action will activate the extension and introduce a search field to your active chat window.

üí¨ Begin typing in this field to filter your chat history based on your input. Chat threads that do not match your search criteria will be hidden, leaving only those relevant to your search visible.

üôÖ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è You can deactivate and remove the search field at any time by clicking on the extension icon again.

Please be aware that there may be some bugs. If you encounter any, we would greatly appreciate your reporting them.

Thank you for your support! ‚ù§Ô∏è

History of Changes

1.07 - Fixed regular annoying welcome page openings

1.06 - Fixed minor issues

1.05 - Fixed minor issues

1.04 - Adjusted filter field location due to the recent interface change by ChatGPT

1.03 - Now hides headers like "7 days ago, 1 month ago" if there are no matching chats

1.02 - Fixed issue with input field disappearing once you clicked on the chat

1.01 - Issues with the name
